ComicInfo.Summary:
Join Mickey Mouse and his friends for new adventures! First, Mickey, Donald, and Goofy find themselves the targets of a shrink ray in "Mickey in Miniature"! Then, Donald is late for his date with Daisy at the park and has to come up with a creative solution in "Donald and the Parking Problem"! And finally, Goofy brings his special skills to acrobatic skiing in "Goofy Off Piste"!
ContentsMickey in Miniature (from Italian Topolino 3286, 2018)Donald and the Parking Problem (from Italian Topolino 3296, 2019)Goofy Off Piste (from Italian Topolino 3293, 2019)*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Marco Mazzarello | 1 | RE | Scorpion Comics Exclusive Virgin Variant Cover | Gabriele Dell'Otto | 2 | RE | Scorpion Comics Exclusive B&W Variant Cover | Gabriele Dell'Otto | 3 |

ComicInfo.Writer: Elena Galli, Francesco Artibani, Pietro Zemelo
ComicInfo.Penciller: Enrico Faccini, Lorenzo Pastrovicchio, Luigi Piras
ComicInfo.Inker: Enrico Faccini, Lorenzo Pastrovicchio, Luigi Piras
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Pete, Chief O'Hara, Daisy Duck, Detective Casey, Donald Duck, Gladstone Gander, Goofy, Mickey Mouse
